main.name: Maranatha Uwase
main.description: I like to code things from scratch, even if it seems to be quite tough for a beginner, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser
main.contactmessage: Have me make stuff for you. If you like my work and have some cool projects to work on, just send me a direct message or contact me through social sites.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business and Information Technology
education.description: Attending University of Kigali i had to study some Business courses which i am going to list some of them. so in business field I undertook: Marketing, Principals of Management,Entrepreneurship, Human ressource Management, Financial Information System, STrategic Management and Business policy, Business Law and so many others. and in Information Technology i did : Database Management System, C programming, Internet Programming and Web optimization,System Analysis and Design, Software Engineering,Multimedia and Computer Graphics nad so many others
So in IPRC  i was required to study mainly General-Electronics, Electronic-Design, Electricity, and Telecommunication.
